title: on course data whereabouts
content: sfu course api - https://api.sfucourses.com/ - data is updated from SFU Course Outlines REST API whenever possible (under process of automation). sfucourses.com is not affiliated with simon fraser university

title: on contributing
content: contribute by submitting issue or pull request on github or just shoot me an email at brian.rahadi@gmail.com

title: on page not loading
content: refresh the page or try again later. data is 100% pulled from sfu course outline api

title: on exporting schedule timetable to google calendar
content: google calendar API does not support importing events from a public URL. you can still export to .ics file and import it to your google calendar

title: on questions, feedback, or comments about the website
